normalized: the classes ended and the students returned to the dormitory, after cleaning up the classroom.
our nemesis, kamimura the hunter, would finally meet her end tonight.
we were going to drive her down into the abyss of depravity, by raping her thoroughly.
i raised the edges of my lips into a smile, now that my preparations were in order, before leaving the classroom.
and soon, the day turned to dark, as the sun set completely.
it was the time of the people who revelled in the night.

name: azuma
normalized: heey!
you're here, huh?
ngh… what?
i had a discomforting feeling, as azuma called out to me while twirling her metal bat in her hand.

name: yamakawa
normalized: professor kamimura, i am here but──
she wasn't being polite at all, was she?

name: yamakawa
normalized: were you looking for me?

name: azuma
normalized: haa?
i was looking for yoou!

name: yamakawa
normalized: ── whaa!?
she readied her metal bat, which was already filled with her aura, before swinging it down on me all of a sudden.
i barely managed to avoid it, by hurling my body to the side.

name: yamakawa
normalized: gaah!?
however, even though my head wasn't crushed, i ended up losing one of my arms.

name: gram
normalized: why are you attacking me!?
damn iit!
i restored my original appearance, before attempting to activate the bug that was planted inside her.
however──

name: azuma
normalized: did you think that i would stop with that!?
gyaa!

name: gram
normalized: ridiculous!?
i didn't even have spare time to be shocked though.
i immediately forged a sword in the palm of my hand, and readied myself for her assault.
however, in that moment,
just as i wondered if i was hearing the rattling sound of an engine revving up, dazzlingly beautiful sparks passed through my body.

name: gram
normalized: goh!?
gaah!?
my other arm, which had been clutching my sword, fell down onto the floor.
i had lost both my arms within a few moments.

name: azuma
normalized: hey!
that's my preey!

name: marika
normalized: he was my enemy first.

name: gram
normalized: w-why is marika heree!?
no way!?
i was so shocked, now that i was facing certain death, that i really ended up stopping in my tracks this time.

name: gram
normalized: guh… …!?
ogh!?
suddenly, a gaping hole opened up through my chest.
is this stab wound… from a spear!?

name: cara
normalized: i have taken your heart.

name: azuma
normalized: even you, miss queen!?
that's my prey, you know!?

name: gram
normalized: cara… as well…!?
just as i realized who it was, i became unable to stand up and slumped over to the floor.
i noticed kitae lying down on the floor, similar to me, as her figure came into my line of sight.
was that the queen's doing as well…?

name: cara
normalized: it was you after all, wasn't it, uncle?
were you aware of the fact that marika was monitoring azuma?

name: gram
normalized: so… that… was it… huh…?

name: azuma
normalized: keeh!?
you were monitoring me, huh?
no wonder i was getting annoying vibes from you all this time.

name: marika
normalized: are you insulting me?
the queen stepped in front of the knight, whose eyes were shining ominously, in order to restrain her.

name: cara
normalized: hey, azuma.
how did you dispel this man's curse?

name: azuma
normalized: well… my body was all weird, as if i was stressed out or something, so i worked with her in order to straighten it out.
the hunter pointed at marika with her chin.

name: azuma
normalized: while she was assaulting me, i realized that i could heal my body if i took one of her attacks head-on.
was it really her annoyingly sharp intuition which had done me in…?

name: azuma
normalized: hey… that really hurt!

name: marika
normalized: i merely did what you told me to.

azuma had sniffed out the bug's weakness using her inhumanly powerful sixth sense, before taking a blow from marika, which was filled with her magical powers, in order to kill the bug inside her body for good.
and with that done, all her memories had been restored.
even though she was a lowly human, she had turned out to be a frighteningly powerful opponent.

name: azuma
normalized: hehehe… well, i was saved thanks to you though.
i'll offer you my gratitude just this once.

name: marika
normalized: … is something wrong with your head?

name: azuma
normalized: can't you even accept it with the proper courtesy?
she said that jokingly while letting out an exaggerated sigh, before turning around and looking down at me.
moreover, her eyes were shining brilliantly as well, entirely like a hunter who had set her eyes on her prey.

name: azuma
normalized: ngh!
for you to humiliate me like that… i won't be able to satiate my thirst for blood… until i smash you to death!

name: azuma
normalized: let the power of the 9 wisdom kings… flow through the demon slayeer!
she swung her silver-coloured weapon, which was empowered with a bluish flame, down on my head with all her strength.
it was the next day.

name: kitae
normalized: aah… master!
yes… of course!
there was no one else but kitae in the director's office.

name: kitae
normalized: please be rest assured.
cara and the others haven't noticed it.
kitae was talking to herself, entirely like a person suffering from some kind of a mental illness.

name: kitae
normalized: haa… i can't wait for you… already…
she hugged herself gently, before caressing herself lovingly,
just under her belly── at the place where her important organ, characteristic of a woman, was located.

name: kitae
normalized: yes.
please leave it to me.
i will be sure to bring you into this world once again, master.
fufufu…
she was talking to no one in particular.
actually, no… it seemed like she was talking with someone living inside of her.
the muffled laughter of a man echoed out of kitae's belly.
